column4: I have a new laptop install with 10.10, and am looking at recommendations.  First:  IRC client?
Yes, well, I can go there, but it's just applications, nothing specific to 10.10 I am insterested in.
yeah Konversation is  quite a lot better than Xchat :)
well Empathy is the default in 10.04 and 10.10 for im
oh yeah Empathy was default in 9.10 as well

Chrome and Chromeium have a user interface that remind me of Internet Explorer 7,  so yeah I don't like, the rendering enginge Webkit for loading up pages that they use is nice though, but  quite a few browsers that use that, just like quite a few use  the Mozilla Gecko renering enginge that are good
Firefox is my primary browser, then I would use  stuff such as Konqueror  or Galeon or Empathy or even Arora
uh that was meant to be  Epiphany above
actsaully I am using an older version of Chromeium here and there recently, but  not that keen on it.

Chrome has built in Flash, and is closed source,  Chromeium doesn't have built in Flash and is open source.  Chrome is based on Chromium, and so they are both quite similar to each other.  I think that answers your question
Wow, nothing I do will get empathy to take my facebook credentials.
theres a Plugin for Pidgin that you can try for that
But empathy is TRYING to set me up and ALWAYS fails.  Pretty poor testimony.
